cause.description:
We are trying to inspire people worldwide to embrace and love " the fix ". The reasons are endless but the time is now . Rise up people ! Declare your love for "the fix " and for all of the people that make it special !
1. "the fix" is #1
2. You are better off because of "the fix "
3. The fix loves you and wants you to be happy .
cause.mission: encourage people to love " the fix"
cause.name: Love the fix
